text:
I installed the new mcaffe antivirus but now I get this error with both .43 
and .44 apache versions:

[Sat Feb 15 16:03:36 2003] [error] (730038)Tentativo di operazione su un 
elemento diverso dal socket.  : winnt_accept: AcceptEx failed. Attempting to 
recover.

It uses 100% of CPU and doesn't work! It behaves the same way also if I 
disable and close all antivirus running processes!!! HOW CAN I FIX THAT??? I 
need to program and cannot unistall antivirus!!!

Please give me instruction!
creator: alighieri_m@libero.it
Kristian.Bergmann@nvg.org
text:
This is a known bug. A temporary fix is to install and use the 1.3.27 httpd in 
tandem with the 2.0. The 1.3 is not affected by this bug and makes for a good 
backup-server.

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
This is not a bug in Apache.  It is a bug in McAfee.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 8325 ***
